name: SYNAQ
description: Cloud and Linux based Service Provider
overview:
SYNAQ cloud-based email and Linux management solution offerings are based on the internationally recognized Software as a Service (SaaS) delivery model. By hosting software solutions on our secure, powerful servers we enable you to quickly reap the benefits of technology without the cost implications.   

Founded in 2004 by two young enthusiasts with a passion to offer Linux and open source software to an emerging market. Today the company is a leader in cloud-based services; focusing on messaging infrastructure, email security, email branding and most things email. SYNAQ lessens risk, cuts cost and complexity, and provides a flexible, always-available end-to-end messaging solution.
